titles.title: I Love You, Lord, But with No Love of Mine

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I love You, Lord, but with no love of mine, For I have none to give. I love You, Lord, but all the love is Thine, For by Your love I live. I am as nothing, and rejoice to be Emptied and lost and swallowed up in Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
